channel.title: jekyll on Khalid's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in jekyll on Khalid's Blog

item.title: Thanks Jekyll. Hello Hugo
item.description: I guess it’s time to say goodbye to Jekyll and thank you. I just can’t go further, I feel like Ruby is too much, struggling with all dependencies, build errors, etc.

item.title: Bye Wordpress, Hello ... ?
item.description: It’s been long years since I used WordPress in 2006 as my blogging platform, back in the old days there’s nothing can beat what WordPress offers for bloggers. So many themes, plugins, and It’s still the most-used and well-known blogging platform until now.
